item.title: Meridee add a quote by Bob Bitchin
item.description: "The difference between an adventure and an ordeal is attitude." -- Bob Bitchin

item.title: Meridee add a quote by Bob Bitchin
item.description: "Don't just dream your life, live your dream." -- Bob Bitchin

item.title: Meridee add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Meridee add a quote by Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni
item.description: "Believe nothing, no matter where you read it, or who said it, no matter if I have said it, unless it agrees with your own reason and your own common sense." -- Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni

item.title: Meridee add a quote by Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy
item.description: "We are the music makers, and we are the dreamers of dreams." -- Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy

item.title: Meridee add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Meridee add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Meridee add a quote by Scott Roeben
item.description: "I'm going through an awkward stage. You know, the one between birth and death." -- Scott Roeben

item.title: Meridee add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Meridee add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa
